name: hectoringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a loud and unpleasantly forceful way, especially in order to get someone to act or think the way you want them to: His manner of hectoringly preaching to the people in his congregation has caused some of them to look for another church or stop attending entirely. The author's tone is hectoringly didactic, but it remains to be seen if the book will motivate readers to take action. Related word
hectoring
